questions.title:
How would you rate your overall cognitive load during this study? Cognitive load is the
amount of mental processing you require to perform a task.

Please order the different types of tasks according to difficulty (from easy to hard):
writing code, debugging, documentation, writing email.

Please order the different types of tasks according to mental effort that needed to be
invested in completing the tasks (from little mental effort to a lot of mental effort):
writing code, debugging, documentation, writing email.
